goals.complete: I tracked and found the white stag, but in my moment of triumph, Gavin betrayed me and escaped with the poor creature. I was wrong to trust him, even though he seemed so honorable.

goals.active: Return to the Grove and report to Caithe.
goals.complete: Caithe thinks we should spy on the Nightmare Court. They'll know where Gavin has taken the white stag, and that might be our best hope to recover it.
